oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gray Floral Dress
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Textiles--History; Clothing and dress;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A grey dress with blue, black and white flowers and leaves design. Roll collar, set-in long sleeves with cuffs, yoke at shoulder, and buttons to a high waistline. The belt is a simple tie belt from the same fabric as dress.
Funding provided by the MTSU Department of Human Sciences and the Digital Seed Grant from Digital Scholarship Initiatives at Walker Library.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Credit Department of Human Sciences, Middle Tennessee State University. Reproduction permitted for non-profit educational and research purposes only.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: MTSU Textiles, Merchandising, and Design Historic Clothing Collection
TXMD Project: Digitizing a Collection of Historic Clothing. A project by faculty and students of the Textiles, Merchandising and Design (TXMD) major in the MTSU Department of Human Sciences.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University
